Description: <w>Holy resistance</w> <y>-1% per charge</y>.<br3>The attacker heals<g> 1 HP per charge</g> when the <w>target is hit</w> by an enemy.
DescriptionExtended: <w>Holy resistance</w> <y>-1% per charge</y>.<br3>The attacker heals<g> 1 HP per charge</g> when the <w>target is hit</w> by an enemy. Remove 1 charge when this happens.
